extendedInfo.description: From the creator of pooping game, Pocket Toilet!!!The gates of hell have been opened and evil army has invaded the world.Your mission is to kill all evil creatures and face the Lord of hell in the final stage.FEATURES:- More than 30 unique characters: sexy devil girl, dragon, ninja, werewolf, dracula, poop master, spider woman, robot, samurai, witch, mummy, bomb, gun, holy water, knight, death, hulk, skeleton king- 10 unique bosses- Simple game control
